title: Boeing Starliner returning empty as NASA turns to SpaceX to bring astronauts back from ISS
content: Boeing will return its capsule from the International Space Station without the NASA astronauts that Starliner delivered to orbit.
summary: Boeing will return its capsule from the International Space Station without the NASA astronauts that Starliner delivered to orbit.

title: Intel has hired Morgan Stanley, other advisers for activist defense
content: With its stock down almost 60% this year, Intel is gearing up to defend itself against pressure from activist investors.
summary: With its stock down almost 60% this year, Intel is gearing up to defend itself against pressure from activist investors.

title: Fed Chair Powell indicates interest rate cuts ahead: 'The time has come for policy to adjust'
content: Powell laid the groundwork for interest rate cuts ahead, though he declined to provide exact indications on timing or extent.
summary: Powell laid the groundwork for interest rate cuts ahead, though he declined to provide exact indications on timing or extent.

title: Bank of England's Bailey: 'More restrictive policy' could still be needed due to labor market shocks
content: Bailey will say he currently places more weight on "the degree of restriction we have in place today easing off over time."
summary: Bailey will say he currently places more weight on "the degree of restriction we have in place today easing off over time."

title: This woman made up to $110,000 a year as a nanny for the ultra-rich. Here's what she learned from the job
content: Stephanie Kiser wanted to be a screenwriter in New York, but those jobs were hard to come by and paid low wages. She found better pay as a nanny for the 1%.
summary: Stephanie Kiser wanted to be a screenwriter in New York, but those jobs were hard to come by and paid low wages. She found better pay as a nanny for the 1%.

title: 33-year-old pays $2,100/month to live with 23 roommates in Brooklyn—take a look inside

title: Japan's yen has seen wild swings this year — is it still a safe-haven asset?
content: Throughout most of 2024, the yen has seen weakness levels not seen since 1986, BOJ interventions, and a rapid strengthening after the BOJ raised rates.
summary: Throughout most of 2024, the yen has seen weakness levels not seen since 1986, BOJ interventions, and a rapid strengthening after the BOJ raised rates.

title: Meta says it found WhatsApp accounts linked to Iranian hackers targeting Biden, Trump officials
content: Meta said it blocked a "small cluster" of WhatsApp accounts linked to an Iranian hacking group  targeting U.S. officials.
summary: Meta said it blocked a "small cluster" of WhatsApp accounts linked to an Iranian hacking group  targeting U.S. officials.

title: Mike Lynch, man once dubbed 'Britain's Bill Gates,' dies at age 59
content: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.
summary: Mike Lynch, who had just recently won a landmark U.S. fraud trial, was found dead in the wreckage of a yacht that sank off the coast of Sicily. He was 59.

title: Microsoft plans September cybersecurity event to discuss changes after CrowdStrike outage
content: Industry participants will discuss the idea of relying more on a safer part of Windows than the privileged kernel mode that CrowdStrike software uses.
summary: Industry participants will discuss the idea of relying more on a safer part of Windows than the privileged kernel mode that CrowdStrike software uses.

title: The big mistake that can leave you ‘highly disappointed’ with your vacation, says travel agent for billionaires

title: What a Harris election victory could mean for Europe and the trans-Atlantic relationship

title: Workday stock gains as software provider widens 2027 margin target

title: Nestle CEO departure seen as 'not such a bad thing' for investors, analyst says

title: No longer a financial reservoir? Saudi Arabia’s spending confirms clear shift in strategy
content: The kingdom's $925 billion sovereign wealth fund, the Public Investment Fund, saw its assets jump 29% in 2023 — and domestic investment was a major driver.

title: Europe stocks close higher, euro and sterling climb as Powell says 'time has come' for lower rates

title: Europe's wineries battle to survive as extreme heat hurts production

title: Corporate loyalty does not pay off, HR expert says, as job hopping gains currency among young people

summary: Just 23% of workers aged 42 and under expressed strong interest in staying with their companies long-term, according to a study by WorkProud.

title: Can a robot give a decent massage? We tested one at a luxury hotel in New York City

title: FDA approves updated Pfizer, Moderna Covid vaccines as virus surges; shots to be available within days
